outputSetting.label: Output Settings
outputSetting.parallelTasksDesc: Adjust according to your computer's performance
outputSetting.hardwareDecodingDesc: Hardware decoding uses the GPU to accelerate the process and reduce CPU utilization.
outputSetting.gpuDecoderMethodDesc: Ensure that your hardware and drivers are working properly. If errors occur, choose CPU as the decoder.

otherSetting.label: Other Settings
otherSetting.preventLowPowerModeDesc: Prevents Windows from entering standby or suspended states, effective only for this session

playerSetting.label: Player Settings
playerSetting.mediaPlayerDesc: All playback methods above use the 'Direct Call' method

about.label: About
about.appOpenSourceNotice: <appName>{{name}}</appName> is an open source project published under the Apache 2.0 License. You can view the source code and contribute to this project on <github>Github</github>

update.noAvailable: No available updates at this time.
update.downloaded: Update downloaded successfully. Do you want to restart the application now to apply the update?
update.error: Update download failed. Please check your network connection.

options.clearAllConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to clear all media files?
options.clickImportAndDrop: Click to import a file, or drag and drop it here
options.clickImportAndDropDesc: Supports importing mp4, mov, mkv, avi, mp3, flac formats

window.closeMessage: Are you sure you want to close?

errMessage.label: Error Message
errMessage.media-info-error: An error occurred while retrieving basic information for media file [{{mediaFile}}], details: {{message}}
errMessage.media-first-frame-error: An error occurred while retrieving the first frame image of media file [{{mediaFile}}], details: {{message}}
errMessage.media-audio-av-error: An error occurred while retrieving waveform of audio file [{{mediaFile}}], details: {{message}}
errMessage.output-directory-not-exist: Output directory [{{path}}] does not exist. Please select another.
